properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 6:30PM AKST until February 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation including freezing rain and snow.
Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice
accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Juneau.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and very slick
sidewalks and steps. Be very careful exiting buildings, and use
handrails whenever possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain should begin to transition to
snow and potentially rain by early Tuesday morning as
temperatures begin to rise above freezing.
properties.instruction:
driveways if you can.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY FOR JUNEAU
